attributes.action: WITHDRAWAL BILL vote options to include NOBREXIT & GOVDEAL after advisory PplsVT
attributes.additional_details: In the 2016 referendum the untruths and illegal overspend & funding of the Brexit campaign misinformed sufficiently to invalidate the result, and even with the lie-aided 17.4 million out  of 53 million electorate this gave Leavers only 25% of the population’s votes. They and the voters among the remaining 75% must be given the opportunity to vote better informed. This is the validation for an advisory people’s vote to Remain in the EU or to Leave.
attributes.background: Untruths,illegal overspend & funding of the Brxt campaign in the 2016 Referendum added to the number of Leave voters.The remedy to be via an Advisory People’s Vote TO REMAIN in EU or TO LEAVE EU and then Withdrawal Bill vote NOBREXIT or GOVDEALThen to Revoke A50 or Leave EU
